title: Senior Backend Developer
desc: Build scalable server applications with Node.js and Python. Design RESTful APIs and microservices.

title: Node.js Developer
desc: Develop backend services with Express.js. Work with MongoDB and implement authentication.

title: Python Django Developer
desc: Build web applications with Django framework. Create robust backend systems with Python.

title: Java Spring Developer
desc: Develop enterprise applications with Spring Boot. Implement microservices architecture.

title: Go Developer
desc: Build high-performance services with Go. Create concurrent applications and APIs.

title: Ruby on Rails Developer
desc: Develop web applications with Ruby on Rails. Follow MVC pattern and conventions.

title: PHP Laravel Developer
desc: Build applications with Laravel framework. Implement Eloquent ORM and Blade templates.

title: Backend Architect
desc: Design scalable backend systems. Choose appropriate databases and technologies.

title: Database Engineer
desc: Design and optimize database schemas. Write efficient SQL queries and procedures.

title: API Developer
desc: Design and implement RESTful APIs. Create comprehensive API documentation.

title: Microservices Developer
desc: Build and maintain microservices architecture. Implement service communication patterns.

title: DevOps Engineer
desc: Implement CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure. Work with Docker and Kubernetes.

title: C# .NET Developer
desc: Build applications with .NET Core framework. Implement ASP.NET Web APIs.

title: Scala Developer
desc: Develop backend services with Scala and Akka. Build functional programming applications.

title: Backend Team Lead
desc: Lead backend development team. Coordinate projects and mentor developers.

title: Redis Specialist
desc: Implement caching solutions with Redis. Optimize data storage and retrieval.

title: Message Queue Engineer
desc: Implement messaging systems with Kafka/RabbitMQ. Ensure reliable message delivery.

title: Backend Security Engineer
desc: Ensure backend application security. Implement authentication and authorization.

title: GraphQL Developer
desc: Implement GraphQL APIs with Apollo or Relay. Design efficient data queries.

title: System Design Engineer
desc: Design large-scale distributed systems. Plan for scalability and fault tolerance.
